Function Documentation

void PortalStateChanger::changePortalCollisionState ( Entity *  pEntity,
bool  isPermissive,
WorldTriangle::Flags  flags 
)

This method changes the state of a portal.

If it does not succeed initially because the chunk is not yet loaded, it retries periodically until successful.

void PortalStateChanger::tick ( float  dTime  ) 

This method should be called periodically to retry any outstanding portal changes.
